Comments_List: I learned about a wide variety of crucial themes and arguments in athletic history and present day events. I was also able to familiarize myself with many patterns that highlight the intersection between sports and politics. This course improved my analytical writing skills.
I learned a different type of writing style, facts about athletes and how politics and sports are co-interdependent.

The guest speakers and documentaries screen during class were beneficial because they presented the course material through a different outlet. Some of the readings were monotonous, and we often did not touch on them in great detail during class.

Strengths: Lots of insightful discussions

Weaknesses: Spending too much class-time watching long videos
Yes, but it helps if you are interested in sports.
Yes! I learned a lot and this course widened my perspective on what it meant to be an athlete. I would highly recommend this course to someone else
